Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=US-ASCII;
	format=flowed;
	delsp=yes
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Below is the proposed agenda for the Heritrix Expert User Forum to be  
held in San Francisco, February 24th and 25th. Please note: the  
location of the forum has been changed.

We would love to include demos and/or presentations from those of you  
who will attend. I've heard from a few of you already, but if you  
haven't contacted me yet and are interested, please email me off list   
at kcarpenter@....

We do need to know if you plan to attend. We have a survey set up here  
to capture attendee info:
http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/PWGH959

Please let us know no later than February 17th if you plan to attend.

For those of you who have already filled out the survey and requested  
lodging recommendations, I will be contacting you off list.

We hope to see you at the Forum!
Kris

Kris Carpenter Negulescu
Director, Web Group
Internet Archive
kcarpenter@...



PLEASE NOTE: The schedule listed below is subject to change.

___________________

Heritrix Expert User Summit

Date: Wednesday, Feb 24th & Thursday, February 25th

Time: 9am - 5:30pm each day

Location: 150 Spear Street (between Mission St and Howard Street,  
south of Market St.) This is a short walk from BART and MUNI.
map link: http://maps.google.com/maps?q=150+Spear+street+san+francisco&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=150+Spear+St,+San+Francisco,+California+94105&gl=us&ei=HLlUS-XOBI2asgOAzY2BCA&ved=0CAoQ8gEwAA&z=16

The meeting space was graciously donated by iWin (Please contact IA  
for meeting information/logistics. Do NOT contact iWin!)


Agenda:

Day One: Weds. Feb 24th

9am - 10am Welcome & Meeting Logistics

Round robin intros and discussion of what each attendee wants to get  
out of the two day session,  revision of the agenda to accommodate  
goals/objectives of the group


10am - 11am Heritrix v3 (H3) - a detailed presentation and open  
discussion of H3 architecture and API's


11am - 11:15am Break


11:15-1pm Open Discussion of H3 continues


1pm-2pm Lunch


2pm- 3:30pm Open Discussion: How to contribute to the Heritrix project/ 
What IA needs to include your code/How to become a committer/Issues  
you've faced in incorporating your code


3:30pm - 3:45pm Break


3:45-5:30pm Use Case Demos/Discussion #1: Planning for and Executing  
Focussed/Topic/Site Based Harvests*

*There are 2 potential demos/presentations from expert users for this  
session; other demos/presos are welcome!


6:30pm No host dinner - Location TBD



Day Two: Thursday, Feb 25th


9am-11am Use Case Discussion #2: Planning for and Executing Large  
Scale Crawls (incl splitting crawls between multiple machines)

Please let us know if you'd like to demo or present your work in this  
area.


11am-11:15am Break


11:15 - 1pm Use Case Discussion #3: Infrastructure planning,  
performance, scalability, and automation**

**There is 1 potential demo/presentation from expert users for this  
session; other demos/presos are welcome!


1pm-2pm Lunch


2-4pm TBD based on interests of the group


4-4:15pm Break

4:15-5:15pm Closing Discussions, Q&A, Wrap up and Prioritization of  
Next Steps


POST meeting:

Friday, February 26th

11am tour of 300 Funston Avenue (new IA HQ)

12noon IA Friday lunch @ 300 Funston Avenue
--Apple-Mail-37--62778777

	charset=US-ASCII
